tweet: I’m closely monitoring the situation in Anchorage & surrounding areas following a 7.0 earthquake. My thoughts & prayers are w all Alaskans at this time. I thank first responders working on the ground, & I encourage residents to heed all safety guidance & alerts. #AlaskaEarthquake

I congratulate the incoming leadership of @HouseNewDems & 30 new Members who were inducted today. I look fwd to working w incoming Chair @RepDerekKilmer; Vice Chairs @RepTerriSewell, @RepScottPeters, @RepAnnieKuster, @RepDelBene; & the rest of the Coalition in the new Congress.

I urge @POTUS to look at the results of the election & reconsider undermining the ACA. When Dems assume the Majority, we will focus on ways to bring health care costs down & protect those w pre-ex conditions, no matter how hard this President & his allies try to do the opposite.

These actions will result in fewer Americans receiving comprehensive health coverage, more consumers with junk plans that provide insufficient coverage, and a fragmented health care market that imposes higher costs on patients and their families.

After being sharply rebuked for their attempts to sabotage the #ACA, @POTUS & the GOP are doubling down on efforts to dismantle the law by directly contradicting the language & intent of the ACA & diluting the impact of the law’s cost-saving subsidies.  http://bit.ly/2FNfrd5

Recent hate-motivated events, including the shooting in PA, demonstrate how the dangerous rise of white nationalism & anti-Semitism is a threat to all Americans & our democracy. I join @bend_thearc in unequivocally rejecting white nationalism in all forms. #RejectWhiteNationalism
